gmd:metadataStandardName.gco:CharacterString: ISO 19139 Geographic Information - Metadata - Implementation Specification

gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: Indiana Department of Environmental Management, Office of Land Quality
Indiana Department of Environmental Management, Office of Land Quality

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: LANDFILL_BOUNDARIES_IDEM_IN.SHP is a polygon shapefile that contains boundaries for open dump sites, approved landfills, and permitted landfills in Indiana, provided by personnel of Indiana Department of Environmental Management, Office of Land Quality (IDEM, OLQ) as of April 8, 2015. The data set provided by IDEM was in an Esri shapefile format and was named 2015Landfill_Boundaries.SHP. LANDFILL_BOUNDARIES_IDEM_IN.SHP is attributed with facility names, permit numbers, and calculated area. This dataset is not complete, but comprises the waste boundaries of landfills as a work in progress. IDEM will periodically update and add new boundaries. The closure date for these landfills runs from the late 1960's to today. Most of them are closed, but a number of them are still active today. Most of the boundaries were digitized as estimated from IDEM personnel experience, but many were base on georeferencing survey maps that are submitted by the facility to IDEM. These landfills with more accurate boundaries are indicated by containing an actual value in the attribute field named VFC_NO.

gmd:purpose.gco:CharacterString: This dataset was developed to provide access to landfill boundaries in Indiana that are managed facilities of the Indiana Department of Environmental Management.

gmd:credit.gco:CharacterString: Engineering and GIS Services, Office of Land Quality, Indiana Department of Environmental Management.

This product is distributed "AS-IS" without warranties of any kind, either expressed or implied, including but not limited to warranties of suitability of a particular purpose or use. No attempt has been made in either the designed format or production of these data to define the limits or jurisdiction of any federal, state, or local government. These data are intended for use only at the published scale or smaller and are for reference purposes only. They are not to be construed as a legal document or survey instrument. A detailed on-the-ground survey and historical analysis of a single site may differ from these data. gmd:otherConstraints.gco:CharacterString: This file is available to anyone, but access may be contingent on written request, specific terms relevant to the agency or person making the request, and or) current freedom of information statutes in the state of Indiana.

gmd:hoursOfService.gco:CharacterString: Monday through Friday, 8:30am to 4:30pm, Eastern DST

gmd:evaluationMethodDescription.gco:CharacterString: The following is excerpted from the metadata provided by IDEM, OLQ for the source shapefile named "2015Landfill_Boundaries.SHP": "Data was compiled by the Engineering & GIS Section within the Office of Land Quality, the Indiana Department of Environmental Management. This dataset is incomplete and a work in progress. This dataset contains information that represents what had been recorded, processed, and archived by IDEM personnel at a time previous to publication. However the dataset may be incomplete and/or inaccurate due to the ever-changing status of managed facilities and sites, and due to the data collection and processing efforts of IDEM staff. It is an ever-changing work in progress. The data has been QA/QC'd for consistency but no formal tests were performed on accuracy. Therefore accuracy cannot be guaranteed or verified. Omissions or null values in certain fields are due to the fact that edits were made in the data dictionary (adding or deleting attribute information) as the project progressed. Human error could have been a factor as well in data omissions."

gmd:measureDescription.gco:CharacterString: This data set was provided by IDEM personnel and is assumed to be accurate.

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: IGS personnel received an Esri shapefile named "2014Landfill_Boundaries.SHP" from IDEM personnel on January 29, 2014. 2014Landfill_Boundaries.SHP was loaded into Esri ArcMap 10.2 and the shapefile was visually checked to ensure that all data provided are contained within the state of Indiana. The attribute fields named "ID" and "ALF_ID" were deleted from the attribute table. IGS personnel then saved the shapefile as LANDFILL_BOUNDARIES_IDEM_IN.SHP. It should also be noted that portions of the associated metadata provided by IDEM for 2014Landfill_Boundaries.SHP were extracted and included in this metadata file.

IGS personnel received an ESRI shapefile named "2015Landfill_Boundaries.SHP" from IDEM personnel on April 8, 2015. 2015Landfill_Boundaries.SHP was loaded into Esri ArcMap 10.3 and the shapefile was visually checked to ensure that all data provided are contained within the state of Indiana. The attribute fields named "ID" and "ALF_ID" were deleted from the attribute table. IGS personnel then saved the shapefile as LANDFILL_BOUNDARIES_IDEM_IN.SHP. It should also be noted that portions of the associated metadata provided by IDEM for 2015Landfill_Boundaries.SHP were extracted and included in this metadata file.

This metadata file was pre-parsed and parsed using CNS (Chew and Spit, v. 2.6.1) and MP (Metadata Parser, v. 2.7.1) software written by Peter N. Schweitzer (U.S. Geological Survey). The errors generated by MP were all addressed and corrected, except that no values were assigned to "Abscissa_Resolution" and "Ordinate_Resolution."
Landfill boundaries in Indiana, current as of April 8, 2015.

gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: IDEM Office of Land Quality; Shane Moore

gmd:useLimitation.gco:CharacterString: This metadata file is intended to accompany the data set identified and received from the IGS. It should not to be altered or summarized. IGS does not support secondary distribution. If this data set was received from anyone besides the IGS, this metadata file and the data set it describes may lack integrity.

gmd:maintenanceNote.gco:CharacterString: Metadata was created as or translated to ISO 19139 for inclusion in the Big Ten Academic Alliance Geoportal.
